basics.name: Sarah Chen
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced software engineer with 8+ years building scalable web applications. Passionate about clean code, mentorship, and solving complex problems with elegant solutions.

work.name: TechCorp Inc.
work.summary: Lead engineer for customer-facing web applications serving 2M+ users.
highlights: Architected and built microservices platform reducing deployment time by 60%
Led team of 5 engineers, established code review practices and mentorship program
Improved application performance by 40% through optimization and caching strategies
Implemented comprehensive test coverage increasing from 45% to 92%

work.name: StartupXYZ
work.summary: Early engineer building product from MVP to Series A.
highlights: Built core platform features using React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL
Implemented real-time collaboration features using WebSockets
Established CI/CD pipeline and deployment automation
Contributed to technical hiring and onboarding processes

work.name: WebAgency Co.
work.summary: Developed client websites and web applications.
highlights: Built 20+ responsive websites for clients across various industries
Learned modern JavaScript frameworks and best practices
Collaborated with designers to implement pixel-perfect UIs
